author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

Updating the PF validation scripts for on-the-fly tests. This update will do nothing for central relval operation for validation.

#### PR validation:

I am using this update to validate one PR under 11_3, and it's working fine.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not backport.

@juska @bendavid
title: PF validation update 11_3_0_pre1
